results.title: Association Between Hypoglycemia Agents and Long-term Survival Outcomes for Patients with Non-muscle-invasive Bladder Cancer Treated with Intravesical Bacillus Calmette-Guerin Immunotherapy.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND AND OBJECTIVE: There is a lack of data on the impact of @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@ agents, especially @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, on prognosis for non-@<m>DISEASE_Non_Muscle_Invasive_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000093284 @@@muscle-invasive bladder cancer@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Non_Muscle_Invasive_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000093284 @@@NMIBC@@@).

results.title: Nonintravesical Interventions for Preventing Intravesical Recurrence in Patients With Nonmuscle-Invasive Bladder Cancer: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis.
results.text_hl: We identified 18 eligible studies (14 RCTs and 4 prospective trials) comprising 4,593 @<m>DISEASE_Non_Muscle_Invasive_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000093284 @@@NMIBC@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, which investigated pharmacological interventions (eg, @CHEMICAL_Selenium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012643 @@@selenium@@@, vitamins, @SPECIES_1582 @@@Lactobacillus casei@@@, @CHEMICAL_Celecoxib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068579 @@@celecoxib@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, mistletoe lectin) and lifestyle modifications (diet).

results.title: Impact of oral hypoglycemic agents on mortality among diabetic patients with non-muscle-invasive bladder cancer: A populationbased analysis.
results.text_hl: Cumulative use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and other hypoglycemic agent were calculated before and after @<m>DISEASE_Non_Muscle_Invasive_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000093284 @@@NMIBC@@@ diagnosis.

results.title: Study protocol of a phase II clinical trial of oral metformin for the intravesical treatment of non-muscle invasive bladder cancer
results.text_hl: Preclinical studies show the potential role of oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment in the management of @<m>DISEASE_Non_Muscle_Invasive_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000093284 @@@NMIBC@@@.

results.title: Association of diabetes mellitus and metformin use with oncological outcomes of patients with non-muscle-invasive bladder cancer.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Non_Muscle_Invasive_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000093284 @@@NMIBC@@@ who do not take @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ seem to be at an increased risk of disease recurrence and progression; @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use seems to exert a protective effect with regard to disease recurrence.

citations.NLM: Rieken M, Xylinas E, Kluth L, Crivelli JJ, Chrystal J, Faison T, Lotan Y, Karakiewicz PI, Fajkovic H, Babjuk M, Kautzky-Willer A, Bachmann A, Scherr DS, Shariat SF. Association of diabetes mellitus and metformin use with oncological outcomes of patients with non-muscle-invasive bladder cancer. BJU Int. 2013 Dec;112(8):1105-12. PMID: 24053906
